name: RI_1_2_Record_Lifespan
title: RI.1.2 Record Lifespan (Header)
purpose: Record Lifecycle Events (Function [[RI.1.1]]) are those required to manage Record Entries in persistent storage over the full course of Record Lifespan (Section [[RI.1.2]]). See Section [[RI.1.1]], Record Lifecycle, for further description.
